content.prompt: Which of the following is an explanation for the similar impact of large-scale commercial agriculture in developed countries and plantation agriculture in developing countries?

choices.label: Both farming practices stimulate local economies with the influx of profits from export-oriented crops.
Both farming practices involve the consolidation of family farms and displacement of rural communities.
Both farming practices provide an increased standard of living in rural communities from the many jobs created to run these large farms.
Both farming practices enable local farmers to remain on their land rather than migrating to jobs in urban areas.
Both farming practices guarantee that long-term sustainable farming methods will be incorporated in their production processes.

unit.text: 5: Agriculture and Rural Land-Use Patterns and Processes

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Explain the significance of geographic similarities and differences among different locations and/or at different times.
